scripts.serve: sass -w scss/shared.scss:css/shared.css scss/index.scss:css/index.css scss/register.scss:css/register.css scss/addnew.scss:css/addnew.css -s compressed --no-source-map
scripts.build: sass scss/shared.scss:css/shared.css scss/index.scss:css/index.css scss/register.scss:css/register.css scss/addnew.scss:css/addnew.css -s compressed --no-source-map
